TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/StartPanel/PlaceList extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::StartPanel::PlaceList abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides a for the background of the right side of the **Start** menu. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList.Normal%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList>類別會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>表示背景的右邊**啟動**功能表。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList.Normal%2A>屬性。 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelPlaceList1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#221](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#221)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#221](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#221)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Normal As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the background of the right side of the **Start** menu.
Docs.value: A表示背景的右邊 * * 開始 * * 功能表。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList.Normal%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList.Normal%2A>屬性。 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelPlaceList1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#221](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#221)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#221](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#221)]
